title: JAM 2021: Writing
short_description: Are you a college or university student, eager to learn how writers of all kinds contribute their skills to the work of the museum?
header_description: Learn how writers of all kinds contribute their skills to the work of the museum.
list_description: Are you a college or university student, eager to learn how writers of all kinds contribute their skills to the work of the museum?
description:
Featured speakers:

Jennifer Oatess, Director, Institutional Relations
Ginia Sweeney, Associate Director, Interpretation
Elizabeth Dudgeon, Communications Editor

This program is meant for college and university students who want to learn about careers in the museum field from working professionals. Learn more about JAM 2021.
buy_button_caption: This free event is for college and university students; registration required
